name: FLOAT (itch) (Vvarx)
description:
Float is a  ambiance filled platformer, where you play as a duckling caught in an oil spill. Tired frightened and alone, dive and navigate through debris to escape the smoke of the oncoming oil fire.

Made for the NAD Creative Jam - Spring 2019

Theme: Trauma and recovery

Technical challenge: Procedural generation

Made by The Eyyy Team:

KAREL BOUCHARD MANU BOUCHER DOMINICK DOYON PIERRE LE HENAFF GABRIEL RHÉAUME VIENNA VON ARX
